original_title: Slave Tears Of Rome Part Two
overview: A beautiful noble born daughter of Rome was taken away from her family and presented as a lesbian slave to her stepmother's cousin in her prison of women and teens. She seeks to take charge of her own destiny, altering her fate and that also of the dominant woman who has enslaved her in lesbian bondage, punished her with the whip and demanded she provide sexual favors
title: Slave Tears Of Rome Part Two
